body: Love the art style, and compare with #108074 (10 years ago). Scenario writer didn't mention it, but the artist did say he loves her, and she also likes him very much. | Hinako wants to have more experience as couple, but her boyfriend is a scum who always drag her to sex. He also having sex with other girls, even laying his hand on her sister (and not trying to hide it). But if there's one thing he's good in, it's sex. Hinako thought many times about breaking up, but can't do it.
